verbs.description: President Trump ’s eldest child , Donald Jr , maybe [V: should] have kept his attention focused on his marriage in 2016 , rather than attempting to be a behind - the - scenes wheeler - dealer for his dad ’s presidential campaign . Everything that has been revealed about his efforts , thus far , have painted a disastrous picture of incompetence . And maybe a bit of corruption . I ’ll …
